types.name: personal fireworks
types.description: Fireworks intended for recreational use during holiday celebrations.

types.name: commercial fireworks
types.description: Fireworks intended for recreational use sponsored by commerical venues such as malls or stadia.

types.name: government fireworks
types.description: Fireworks intended for municipal use, sold to governments of cities, states, or countries.

types.name: commercial demolition
types.description: For use by professional developers and demolition contractors.
